type: Electrical equipment and components and supplies
short_summary: Procurement of electrical equipment and other components
description: The Department of National Defence has a requirement for the items detailed below.
full_summary:
# Request for Proposal: Light and Electrical Materials
## Tender Details

**Reference Number:** CB-7734-75887362
**Solicitation Number:** W8486-239057/A
**Publication Date:** 01 August 2023
**Tender Closing Date:** 13 October 2023 14:00 (EST)
**Expected Contract Start and End Dates:** None
**Tender Status:** Expiré

**Procurement Details**

The Department of National Defence is seeking a contractor to provide a range of light and electrical materials, as outlined in the Requirements Document.

**Procurement Details:**

* **Procurement Category:** Goods and Services
* **Procurement Method:** Competitive Tendering (Open Bidding)
* **Selection Criteria:** Lowest Price
* **Trade Agreements:** Various free trade agreements between Canada and participating countries
* **Regions of Opportunity:** Worldwide
* **Regions of Delivery:** Montréal, Edmonton

**Contract Description:**

The Contractor is required to deliver the following items to the following locations within the specified timeframe:

* **Item 1:** 20 units of GENERAL ILLUMINATION LIGHT SET (GSIN: 6210, NSN: 6210-20-003-7431) to be delivered to CFSD Montréal
* **Item 2:** 5 units of GENERAL ILLUMINATION LIGHT SET (GSIN: 6210, NSN: 6210-20-003-7431) to be delivered to CFSD Edmonton
* **Item 3:** 60 units of OPTOELECTRONIC DISPLAY (GSIN: 5980, NSN: 5980-20-000-7993) to be delivered to CFSD Montréal
* **Item 4:** 40 units of OPTOELECTRONIC DISPLAY (GSIN: 5980, NSN: 5980-20-000-7993) to be delivered to CFSD Edmonton
* **Item 5:** 70 units of ELECTRICAL CONNECTOR COVER (GSIN: 5935, NSN: 5935-20-000-0981) to be delivered to CFSD Montréal
* **Item 6:** 30 units of ELECTRICAL CONNECTOR COVER (GSIN: 5935, NSN: 5935-20-000-0981) to be delivered to CFSD Edmonton
* **Item 7-15:** Additional items are listed in the
